title: Lets talk about what we can improve on.
body:
Alright GD, in this thread we step down from our "i should be challenger" high horses.

What's something you should improve on in-game?

Share yours incase somebody else is doing the same thing, but doesn't realise. 

For me; I really have to stop mumbling behind my screen/on skype when some idiot is waaay out of position every time i look at the map and just spam ping the fucker. also my cs is that of kaceytron.

Your turn, noobs.

https://38.media.tumblr.com/4c6f97febcfe6453be478b3cea66eee4/tumblr_n4799kOZrb1rl8k3mo2_400.gif
